if.if: insert into product(pID,p_top_idx,p_sub_idx,pNAME,pPRICE,pSTOCK,pIMAGE1,pCONTENT,pdiscount) values(#{pID},(select top_idx from topmenu where top_name=#{top_name}),(select sub_idx from submenu where sub_name=#{sub_name}), #{pNAME},#{pPRICE},#{pSTOCK},#{pIMAGE1},#{pCONTENT},#{pdiscount})

insert into product(pID,p_top_idx,p_sub_idx,pNAME,pPRICE,pSTOCK,pIMAGE1,pCONTENT,pdiscount,pIMAGE2) values(#{pID}, (select top_idx from topmenu where top_name=#{top_name}),(select sub_idx from submenu where sub_name=#{sub_name}), #{pNAME},#{pPRICE},#{pSTOCK},#{pIMAGE1},#{pCONTENT},#{pdiscount},#{pIMAGE2})

mapper.select: select pID,pNAME,pPRICE,pIMAGE1,pCONTENT,to_char(pDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')as pDATE,phit from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by pid desc) as RNUM, tb.* from product tb ) tb where (RNUM between #{pro_rowStart} and #{pro_rowEnd})

sql.if: and (p_top_idx=(select top_idx from topmenu where top_idx=#{p_top_idx}))
and (p_sub_idx=(select sub_idx from submenu where sub_idx=#{p_sub_idx}))

if.test: pNAME!=null and pPRICE!=null and pSTOCK!=null and pCONTENT!=null

mapper.select: select pID, pNAME, p_top_idx, p_sub_idx, pPRICE, pIMAGE1, pIMAGE2, pCONTENT, pSTOCK, phit, pdiscount from product where pid = #{pid}
